# DisplaySettings.MaxLevels property

Gets or sets the maximum number of levels of the tree structure to write. A value less than or equal to zero indicates no limitation.

```csharp
public int MaxLevels { get; set; }
```

## Return Value

The maximum number of levels of the tree structure to write.
